pkgmetadata.longdescription: Downloading Time Series from ALFRED Database for Various Vintages // Provides direct access to the ALFRED (https://alfred.stlouisfed.org) and FRED (https://fred.stlouisfed.org) databases. Its functions return tidy data frames for different releases of the specified time series. Note that this product uses the FRED API but is not endorsed or certified by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.
